articles.title: COVID-19 pandemic has further exposed inequality in Australia - SBS News
articles.description: The national health data agency also found that while Australia fared comparatively well when it came to the direct impacts of the COVID-19 pandemic, the wellbeing of many Australians has suffered.
articles.content:
Up to early July 2020, it is estimated that health care workers in Australia were 2.7 times as likely to contract COVID-19 as the general community.
